faq_account_title_1.content: Where can I check my account ID?

faq_account_desc_1.content: The account ID is displayed above the level in the lower side of the screen.

faq_account_title_2.content: I want to know how to link my account.

faq_account_desc_2.content:
To link your account, go to Settings → Other → Account.

If you use a guest account, it will be converted to a registered account after linking. Please note that unlinked accounts are susceptible to data loss when immediate access is lost.

※ NOTE
To prevent loss of account data, accounts linked at least once must maintain linkage with at least 1 external service at a time.

faq_account_title_3.content: I forgot my account ID and/or the password.

faq_account_desc_3.content:
If you cannot remember the ID or the password of the account you linked your game account to, please contact the customer support of the respective service.

Google Customer Support: <color=#F8C200><u><link="https://support.google.com/accounts/#topic=3382296">https://support.google.com/accounts/#topic=3382296</link></u></color>
Apple Customer Support: <color=#F8C200><u><link="https://support.apple.com/ko-kr">https://support.apple.com/ko-kr</link></u></color>
Steam Customer Support: <color=#F8C200><u><link="https://help.steampowered.com/ko/wizard/HelpWithPurchase.Vender+cromos+raacutepidamente+con+Steam+In">https://help.steampowered.com/ko/wizard/HelpWithPurchase.Vender+cromos+raacutepidamente+con+Steam+In</link></u></color>

※ NOTE
Please be aware that unlinked guest accounts may be permanently lost upon migrating devices or deleting the application.

faq_account_title_4.content: Can I keep using my account after changing to a different device or reinstalling the game?

faq_account_desc_4.content:
Even if you migrate to a different device or delete and then reinstall the application, you can log in with an existing account to continue playing.

However, please note that guest accounts that did not undergo any integration may be lost when access to the application is lost.

faq_account_title_5.content: How do I delete (close) my account?

faq_account_desc_5.content:
You may only delete (close) an account that is linked with another service.
Guest accounts also need to be linked before closure.
To delete (close) an account, enter Settings → ‘Other’ → ‘Close Account’.

※ When you choose to close the account, you will be given a 14-day grace period, after which the closure is fully complete.
※ All game data will be lost when the account is deleted, so proceed with caution.

faq_account_title_6.content: Can a closed account be recovered?

faq_account_desc_6.content: If you log into the account before the 14-day grace period ends, you can restore the account.

faq_account_title_7.content: My account was suspended. Why is that?

faq_account_desc_7.content:
To provide an enjoyable experience, we operate under Terms of Service.
Misconduct and violations of the terms that negatively affect the service and its management may result in restrictions from playing the game.

<color=#F8C200><u><link="https://limbuscompany.kr/policy/">[Read full text]</link></u></color>

Please understand that we are unable to help you with restrictions carried out according to the Terms of Service.

faq_account_desc_8.content:
Please understand that we are unable to provide help regarding issues with external accounts linked to the user’s game account as we are unable to ensure that the access is not fraudulent. In such cases, please contact the customer support of the respective service.

Google Customer Support: <color=#F8C200><u><link="https://support.google.com/accounts/#topic=3382296">https://support.google.com/accounts/#topic=3382296</link></u></color>
Apple Customer Support: <color=#F8C200><u><link="https://support.apple.com/ko-kr">https://support.apple.com/ko-kr</link></u></color>
Steam Customer Support: <color=#F8C200><u><link="https://help.steampowered.com/ko/wizard/HelpWithPurchase.Vender+cromos+raacutepidamente+con+Steam+In">https://help.steampowered.com/ko/wizard/HelpWithPurchase.Vender+cromos+raacutepidamente+con+Steam+In</link></u></color>

faq_normal_title_1.content: I couldn’t find an article that answers my question. Where should I make my inquiry?

faq_normal_desc_1.content:
For inquiries not covered in the FAQ, please contact our Customer Service email.

Account Inquiry

retunPolicy_Info_Paragraph_1.content: We would like to inform you of our Refund Policy as per the information written in the 「Limbus Company Terms of Service」.

retunPolicy_Info_Desc_1.content: 1. Members who have signed a contract for the purchase of paid Contents with the Company can withdraw their subscription without the burden of additional fees or penalties within 7 days from the later of the date of the purchase contract or the date the Contents is available.

retunPolicy_Info_Desc_2.content: 2. Members cannot withdraw their subscriptions under Paragraph 1 against the will of the Company in the following cases. However, in the case of a purchase contract consisting of divisible Contents, this does not apply to the remaining parts of divisible Contents that do not fall under each of the following subparagraphs.

retunPolicy_Info_Desc_2_1.content: (1) Contents used or applied immediately upon purchase

retunPolicy_Info_Desc_2_2.content: (2) Contents in which additional benefits are used, if additional benefits are provided

retunPolicy_Info_Desc_2_3.content: (3) If there is an act of opening Contents that can be seen as a use or whose utility is determined at the time of opening

retunPolicy_Info_Desc_3.content: 3. In the case of Contents that cannot be withdrawn under each subparagraph of Paragraph 2, the Company clearly displays the fact in a place where Members can easily find out and provides trial use products for the Contents (temporary use permitted, experience only) or if it is difficult to provide it, the Company provides information about the Contents so that the exercise of the Member's right to withdraw the subscription is not hindered.

tutorial_mainui_27_walpu3_01_title.content: The 3rd Walpurgis Night - Into a Certain Library's Book

tutorial_mainui_27_walpu3_01_title_01.content: The 3rd Walpurgis Night - Into a Certain Library's Book

tutorial_mainui_27_walpu3_01_desc_01.content: [The 3rd Walpurgis Night - Into a Certain Library's Book] unlocks regardless of your progress in the Main Story. Enter via the event banner on the Window or the Driverside tabs.

tutorial_mainui_27_walpu3_02_desc_01.content: The duration of The 3rd Walpurgis Night - Into a Certain Library's Book event is shown here. During the event, complete Missions for Easy and Hard difficulty event Encounters and claim their rewards.

tutorial_mainui_27_walpu3_03_desc_01.content:
Select the door to begin the Easy difficulty Encounter.
The Encounter consumes an Enkephalin Module upon entry.
On Easy difficulty, any Deployed Identities under Level 45 will be raised to Level 45.
Also, any Deployed Identities under Tier 3 Uptie Level will be raised to Tier 3 Uptie Level.
However, your current E.G.O Threadspinning Tiers will be reflected.

tutorial_mainui_27_walpu3_03_desc_02.content:
Clearing the Easy difficulty Encounter unlocks the Hard difficulty.
In Hard difficulty, your Identities' current Levels, Uptie Tiers, and E.G.O Threadspinning Tiers will be reflected.

tutorial_mainui_27_walpu3_04_desc_01.content: The #1 Sinner to be Deployed in the Teams menu will be imbued with the 'Librarian of History' effect. The effects of 'Librarian of History' differs between Easy/Hard difficulties. Sinner imbued with this effect will gain more Slots and various other beneficial effects.

tutorial_mainui_27_walpu3_05_desc_01.content: You can enter the [Missions] page, where you can view the list of Missions to be completed during the Encounter and their rewards.

tutorial_mainui_27_walpu3_06_desc_01.content: You can view the Reward Exchange period in the [Missions] page.

tutorial_mainui_27_walpu3_06_desc_02.content: Easy difficulty and Hard difficulty each has different sets of Missions to complete.

tutorial_mainui_27_walpu3_06_desc_03.content: Complete these Missions and claim various rewards from the [Missions] page.

tutorial_mainui_27_walpu3_07_desc_01.content: Even after the event fully ends, you will be able to experience the 'The 3rd Walpurgis Night - Into a Certain Library's Book' combat Encounters and view its story anytime at the Driverside and Theater - [Detour Tales].

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_01_desc_01.content: Season 4's Mirror Dungeon is called 'Mirror of the Wuthering'.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_01_desc_02.content: Choose between 'Simulation' and 'Ritornello' difficulties to enter.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_02_desc_01.content: Every week, Mirror Dungeons offer Weekly Bonuses. Use Weekly Bonuses when you're claiming the rewards for the run—and receive greatly increased rewards.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_02_desc_02.content: Every week, you can receive 3 Weekly Bonuses regardless of difficulty.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_02_desc_03.content: In Ritornello difficulty, you can use 2 or more Weekly Bonuses at once, and will receive rewards proportional to the number of Weekly Bonuses used.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_02_desc_04.content: However, it is more enkephalin-efficient to use all 3 Weekly Bonuses at once rather than to use them one at a time.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_03_desc_01.content: You can view your currently deployed Sinners here.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_03_desc_02.content: Collect Starlight from completing Mirror Dungeons and use them to obtain several Starter Buffs that will help you in the Mirror Dungeon.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_03_desc_03.content: You can view the list of Floor Theme Packs that appear in the Mirror Dungeon. Selected Floor Theme Pack records will be collected here.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_03_desc_04.content: You can view the list of E.G.O Gifts that appear in the Mirror Dungeon. Obtaining an E.G.O Gift in the Mirror Dungeon will add an entry to your E.G.O Gift Compendium.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_04_desc_01.content: You can increase your chances of obtaining helpful E.G.O Gifts during your Mirror Dungeon run by activating more Starter Buffs.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_04_desc_02.content: Starter Buffs do not change with the Mirror Dungeon difficulties.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_04_desc_03.content: You can obtain Starlight from completing Mirror Dungeon runs.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_04_desc_04.content: The higher you rise through the Mirror Dungeon floors, the more Starlight you will obtain.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_05_desc_01.content: When you enter a Mirror Dungeon, you’ll be offered a selection of Keyword-based categories of E.G.O Gifts. At first, you will only have access to the Random category. However, you can unlock more Keyword categories as you activate more Starter Buffs.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_05_desc_02.content: E.G.O Gifts appearing in each category are fixed. You can choose as many E.G.O Gifts as it is available to you from the same category.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_05_desc_03.content: You can obtain extra Starlight by choosing an E.G.O Gift category that you did not use in your immediately preceding run.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_06_desc_01.content: Select Sinners who will participate in the Mirror Dungeon run.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_06_desc_02.content: In the Mirror Dungeon deployment stage, all Identity Levels will be fixed to 45. In the Ritornello difficulty, your current Identity levels will be reflected instead. (Max Lv. 45)

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_06_desc_03.content: Deploy 1★ or 2★ Identities to gain additional Cost upon entry.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_06_desc_04.content: Deploy Identities that have not been used in your immediately preceding Run to gain additional Cost upon entry.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_07_desc_01.content: The deployed Identity's Rest Bonus will be completely exhausted upon clearing the Mirror Dungeon. The more Rest Bonus you exhaust, the more Starlight you will earn.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_07_desc_02.content: However, Identities that have been swapped in or out during the Mirror Dungeon run will not spend their Rest Bonuses, and will not provide additional Starlight.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_07_desc_03.content: Identities that did not spend their Rest Bonuses, and Identities that were not swapped in or out will gain 1 Bar of Rest Bonus.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_08_desc_01.content: After finishing up the initial Team setup, press 'Confirm' to enter the Mirror Dungeon.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_08_desc_02.content: This area displays the additional Cost you have gained over the deployment process.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_09_desc_01.content: Upon entering a new Floor, you will be presented with a collection of different 'Themes' that you can choose to face on this Floor. Select and pull down a Card Pack you would like to challenge for this Floor.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_09_desc_02.content: You can view the available Bosses and E.G.O Gifts from the Theme Pack by pressing this button in the top right corner of each Theme Pack.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_09_desc_03.content: At the bottom of the Floor Theme Packs, you can view the E.G.O Gifts that you can choose from after defeating the boss of the Floor Theme.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_09_desc_04.content: Because each Floor Theme has a set range of E.G.O Gifts and Choices, it would be most effective to choose the Floor Theme Pack that has enemies that are weak to your current Team composition, or Floor Theme Packs with E.G.O Gifts that you need.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_10_desc_01.content: The Mirror Dungeon rooms and paths are randomly generated.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_10_desc_02.content: You proceed by moving to nodes adjacent to your current node. You may find various events or combat encounters in each of the nodes.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_10_desc_03.content: You will earn 'Starlight' and 'Cost' as you proceed through the Mirror Dungeon. Starlight can be spent to engrave stars(activate) Starter Buffs, and 'Cost' can be spent at Shops and Rest Stops found in the Mirror Dungeon.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_11_desc_01.content: Acquired E.G.O Gifts are displayed here. E.G.O Gifts are items that offer powerful effects that last until the end of the Dungeon.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_11_desc_02.content: Below the combat Encounter nodes in Mirror Dungeons are types and affinities effective against the enemies in each node.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_11_desc_03.content: The HP, SP, and lost lives of your Sinners will carry over between encounters.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_12_desc_01.content: At Shops, you can spend your 'Cost' to purchase E.G.O Gifts, heal allies, deploy/swap out additional Identities or power up selected Identities.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_12_desc_02.content: At Shops, you can sell E.G.O Gifts you don't use to obtain 'Cost'.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_13_desc_01.content: At Rest Stops, you can spend your 'Cost' to heal allies, deploy/swap out additional Identities or enhance E.G.O Gifts.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_13_desc_02.content: You can Fuse E.G.O Gifts to obtain different E.G.O Gifts.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_14_desc_01.content: There is a chance for 'Encounter Reward Cards' to appear after winning an Encounter. The harder the Encounter difficulty, the higher the chance of obtaining an Encounter Reward Card.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_14_desc_02.content: You can obtain various resources such as Cost, Starlight, E.G.O Gifts, or E.G.O Resources from the Encounter Reward Cards.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_15_desc_01.content: Upon clearing a floor, you will obtain random enemy buffs tied to each E.G.O Gifts.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_15_desc_02.content: Enemy Buffs will continue to stack with every floor cleared.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_16_desc_01.content: Upon clearing a Mirror Dungeon run, spend Enkephalin Modules to claim your rewards.

tutorial_mirrordungeon04_page_16_desc_02.content: The amount of rewards depends on the number of cleared Floors. You can use Weekly Bonus chances to claim even more rewards.

LobotomyClearTypo_Desc_2.content: They complied with nothing in their bid to understand. They simply did so.

tutorial_mainui_walpu4_01_title_01.content: The 4th Walpurgis Night - The Noon of Violet

tutorial_mainui_walpu4_01_desc_01.content: [The 4th Walpurgis Night - The Noon of Violet] unlocks regardless of your progress in the Main Story. Enter via the event banner on the Window or the Driverside tabs.

tutorial_mainui_walpu4_02_desc_01.content: The duration of The 4th Walpurgis Night event is shown here. During the event, complete Missions for Easy and Hard difficulty event Encounters and claim their rewards.

tutorial_mainui_walpu4_03_desc_01.content: Select the door to begin the Easy difficulty Encounter. The Encounter consumes an Enkephalin Module upon entry. On Easy difficulty, any Deployed Identities under Level 45 will be raised to Level 45. Also, any Deployed Identities and E.G.O under Tier 3 Uptie/Threadspinning Level will be raised to Tier 3 Uptie Level.

tutorial_mainui_walpu4_03_desc_02.content: Clearing the Easy difficulty Encounter unlocks the Hard difficulty. In Hard difficulty, your Identities' current Levels, Uptie Tiers, and E.G.O Threadspinning Tiers will be reflected.

tutorial_mainui_walpu4_04_desc_01.content: The #1 Sinner to be deployed in the Teams menu will be imbued with the 'Training Team Captain' effect. The Sinner with the 'Training Team Captain' effect will gain more Slots and other beneficial effects.

tutorial_mainui_walpu4_05_desc_01.content: You can enter the [Missions] page, where you can view the list of Missions to be completed during the Encounter and their rewards.

tutorial_mainui_walpu4_06_desc_01.content: You can view the Reward Exchange period in the [Missions] page.

tutorial_mainui_walpu4_06_desc_02.content: Easy difficulty and Hard difficulty each has different sets of Missions to complete.

tutorial_mainui_walpu4_06_desc_03.content: Complete these Missions and claim various rewards from the [Missions] page.

tutorial_mainui_walpu4_07_desc_01.content: Even after the event fully ends, you will be able to experience the 'The 4th Walpurgis Night - The Noon of Violet' combat Encounters and view its story anytime at the Driverside and Theater - [Detour Tales].
